query: We're seeking a 7-day travel itinerary for 2 people departing from Phoenix and planning to explore 3 various cities in California from March 10th to March 16th, 2022. Our budget is set at $3,400. We would also love to enjoy Mediterranean and French cuisines during our trip.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Santa Rosa,Los Angeles,Santa Maria]
